title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           72 McBride Avenue  Paterson, NJ 07501                 Directions         From: Garden State Parkway (New Jersey) North: Take exit 155P on left to Route 19 TO WEST Route 80 Paterson. South: Take Exit 159 (Saddlebrook) on your right. After taking the exit, make your second right onto I-80 West (Paterson). From: Interstate 80 I-80 West: Take Exit 57 A-B. Taking (Exit 57- B) (Downtown Paterson) follow the Downtown Paterson sign. I-80 East: Take (Exit 57- B), take exit Route 80 west Grand St./ Del Water Gap KEEP RIGHT exit. Stay to the right for Grand Street exit ramp.   Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Welcome Center Hours-Seasonal Welcome Center Hours from May 15th to November 30th. Please see our website for my precise hours.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Monday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Thursday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Friday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM   Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM      General Park Hours Overlook Park and Mary Ellen Kramer Park are always available for visitors but the best times for viewing are between sunrise and sunset.   Standard Hours    Sunday: Sunrise - Sunset   Monday: Sunrise - Sunset   Tuesday: Sunrise - Sunset   Wednesday: Sunrise - Sunset   Thursday: Sunrise - Sunset   Friday: Sunrise - Sunset   Saturday: Sunrise - Sunset             Weather           http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?lat=40.91475800178142&lon=-74.1678490947591#.VusP4uIrK71         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   No Fee - $0.00 There is no fee to enter Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park   Entrance Passes:   None required - $0.00 Entrance passes are not required nor are they available at this site.         Visitor Centers      Welcome Center Hours-Seasonal Welcome Center Hours from May 15th to November 30th. Please see our website for my precise hours.   Standard Hours   Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Monday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Tuesday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Wednesday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Thursday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Friday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:30 PM                             Directions to the Park.                Falls from the newly opened Mary Ellen Kramer...             Welcome to Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park!   The park is open every day! Some park facilities and roads are closed during the winter. Visit Operating Hours & Seasons for more information. Looking to buy a park pass? Check out our Fees & Passes page. If you're traveling with your dog, please visit our Pets page.
